name: BukoCrypto - Sequenza a firenze
description:
Sketchbook on the Italian Renaissance. Aura extracts from Michelangelo, Leonardo, Fra Angelico, and also other masters.
Fragments and Scenes from the birth of perspective, from the announcement of the arrival of the EU in the history of Western art. Through Mary's Stream, glimpses of John the Baptist and Evangelist, Nicodemus, David, and Gabriel are studied in this artist's book.

Observation in locu - Firenze 2016

Digital manufacture of the artist's book - São Paulo, 2021

@blusimonwasem
